static analyze(chat)[source]¶

Analyzer factory function

Find appropriate Analyzer for this utterance

Parameters:chat (Chat) – Chat to be analyzed
Returns:analyzer – Appropriate Analyzer Subclass
Return type:Analyzer
static analyze_complement_with_preposition(triple)[source]¶

This function analyses triple complement which starts with a preposition and updates the triple :param triple: S,P,C triple :return: updated triple

analyze_np(triple)[source]¶

This function analyses noun phrases :param triple: S,P,C triple :return: triple with updated elements

analyze_one_word_complement(triple)[source]¶

This function analyses one word complement and updates the triple :param triple: S,P,C triple :return: updated triple

analyze_possessive(triple, element)[source]¶

This function analyses possessive phrases, which start with pos. pronoun :param triple: subject, predicate, complement triple :param element: element of the triple which has the possessive phrase :return: updated triple

analyze_vp(triple, utterance_info)[source]¶

This function analyzes verb phrases :param triple: triple (subject, predicate, complement) :param utterance_info: the result of analysis thus far :return: triple and utterance info, updated with the results of VP analysis

chat¶

returns: chat – Chat to be analyzed :rtype: Chat

fix_predicate(predicate)[source]¶

This function returns the lemmatized predicate and fixes the errors with lemmatizing :param predicate: predicate to lemmatize :return: lemmatized predicate

get_types_in_triple(triple)[source]¶

This function gets types for all the elements of the triple :param triple: S,P,C triple :return: triple dictionary with types

static check_triple_completeness(triple)[source]¶

This function checks whether an extracted triple is complete :param triple: S,P,C triple :return: True if the triple has all three elements, False otherwise

static extract_perspective(predicate, utterance_info=None)[source]¶

This function extracts perspective from statements :param predicate: statement predicate :param utterance_info: product of statement analysis thus far :return: perspective dictionary consisting of sentiment, certainty, and polarity value

initialize_triple()[source]¶

This function initializes the triple with assumed word order: NP VP C subject is the NP, predicate is VP and complement can be NP, VP, PP, another S or nothing
